name: Mafruka Recipe | Gulzar Hussain | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for Mafruka Recipe: Semolina 500 grams Condense Milk 1 tin Corn Flour 1 tbsp Sugar 2 cup Dry Fruit as required Clarified Butter 1 cup Jam-e-Shirin as required
instructions: Take a cooking pot add as required water and 2 cups of sugar and make a sugar syrup and set a side. Take another pan add 1 cup of clarified butter add 500 grams of semolina and roast the semolina Then add sugar syrup and let it cool down Take another sauce pan heat 1 tin of condense milk add as required dry fruits and 1 tbsp corn flour mix it well . Then spread the semolina mixture in grease proof tray pour the condense milk mixture in it chilled in refrigerator and serve it.
